Modifies player's aim assist.

== Syntax ==
: <code>aimassist <players: target> clear</code>
:: Clears the aim assist.
: <code>aimassist <players: target> set [x angle: float] [y angle: float] [max distance: float] [target mode: AimAssistTargetMode] [preset id: string]</code>
:: Sets the aim assist.

== Arguments ==
{{argument|be=1|players: target|CommandSelector<Player>}}
: Specifies the player that the aim assist will be modified.
: {{arg desc|be=player}}
{{argument|be=1|x angle: float|float}}
: Specifies the X-axis angle, defaults to 50.
: {{arg desc|be=float}} And must be between 10 and 90 (inclusive).
{{argument|be=1|y angle: float|float}}
: Specifies the Y-axis angle, defaults to 50.
: {{arg desc|be=float}} And must be between 10 and 90 (inclusive).
{{argument|be=1|max distance: float|float}}
: Specifies the max distance, defaults to 8.
: {{arg desc|be=float}} And must be between 1 and 16 (inclusive).
{{argument|be=1|target mode: AimAssistTargetMode|enum}}
: Specifies the aim mode, defaults to {{cd|angle}}. Must be one of the following:
:* {{cd|angle}} — Angle
:* {{cd|distance}} — Distance
{{argument|be=1|preset id: string|basic_string}}
: Specifies the preset ID.
: {{arg desc|be=basic_string}}
